text: Patrick William Sá de Oliveira (born 3 June 1997), known as just Patrick William, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a extremo for the club Famalicão in the Primeira Liga. ==Professional career== Patrick William made his professional debut with Ceará Sporting Club in a 1-0 Campeonato Brasileiro Série A loss to Cruzeiro on 3 June 2018. On 25 June 2019, He signed a professional contract for 5 years with F.C. Famalicão in the Portuguese Primeira Liga. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from São Leopoldo Category:Brazilian footballers Category:F.C. title: Patrick William
